医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示了性别之间早期大脑的差异剑桥大学自闭症研究中心的研究表明，大脑结构的性别差异从出生起就存在。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Study-sheds-light-on-early-brain-differences- Between-genders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Study-sheds-light-on-early-brain-differences- Between-genders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9d2b9496-b958-483a-889c-508cb9a00ee1 Tue, 07 Jan 2025 07:09:37 -0500 Study sheds light on early brain differences between genders
加州大学洛杉矶分校教授分享对青少年精神病风险的神经生物学的见解在一次全面的基因组新闻采访中，加州大学洛杉矶分校精神病学、生物行为科学和心理学教授 Carrie E. Bearden 博士分享了对年轻人精神病风险的神经生物学的变革性见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/UCLA-professor-shares-insights-into-the-neurobiology-of-psychosis-risk-in-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/UCLA-professor-shares-insights-into-the-neurobiology-of-psychosis-risk-in-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=306fa048-4038-4536-8196-a974892a00a3 Tue, 07 Jan 2025 06:59:23 -0500 UCLA professor shares insights into the neurobiology of psychosis risk in adolescents
一条胳膊和一条腿：聆听者为正义而战乔伊·巴拉德 (Joey Ballard) 是伊利诺伊大学芝加哥分校的内科住院医师。他写信给《An Arm and a Leg》，内容涉及美国医学协会最近通过的一项决议，呼吁医院采取更多措施，确保有资格获得慈善护理的患者得到治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/An-Arm-and-a-Leg-A-Listener-fighting-the-good-fight.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/An-Arm-and-a-Leg-A-Listener-fighting-the-good-fight.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c5a6867c-a569-4b95-a916-fd9ea94b7378 Tue, 07 Jan 2025 06:01:00 -0500 An Arm and a Leg: A listener fighting the good fight
医疗保健是纽瑟姆最大的未完成项目。特朗普使这项任务变得复杂化。民主党人加文·纽瑟姆 (Gavin Newsom) 誓言成为加州“医疗保健州长”，上任六年后，他已将数百亿美元的公共资金用于为该州最需要的居民提供安全网服务，同时制定规则，使所有加州人更容易获得和负担得起医疗保健。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Health-care-is-Newsome28099s-biggest-unfinished-project-Trump-comlicates-that-task.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Health-care-is-Newsome28099s-biggest-unfinished-project-Trump-comlicates-that-task.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bf7bedbe-1323-401a-bf02-f35d1ba281da Tue, 07 Jan 2025 05:49:32 -0500 Health care is Newsom’s biggest unfinished project. Trump complicates that task.
拜登政府禁止将医疗债务纳入信用评分联邦消费者金融保护局周二发布了新规定，禁止将医疗债务纳入美国信用报告，就在乔·拜登总统即将卸任的几天前颁布了一项重大的新消费者保护措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Biden-administration-bars-medical-debt-from-credit-scores.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Biden-administration-bars-medical-debt-from-credit-scores.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99dfa95c-9a48-4b9d-8010-42ecd6cf0e1d Tue, 07 Jan 2025 05:37:09 -0500
孤独和社会孤立如何在分子水平上影响您的健康这项研究确定了将社会关系与心血管疾病和死亡率联系起来的蛋白质，为疾病预测和预防提供了见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/How-loneiness-and-social-isolation-impact-your-health-at-the-molecular-level.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/How-loneiness-and-social-isolation-impact-your-health-at-the-molecular-level.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=21c33ce8-263c-4f96-ab10-7ca3a9069066 Tue, 07 Jan 2025 05:06:00 -0500 How loneliness and social isolation impact your health at the molecular level
研究人员利用鼻转录组学发现了青少年不同的哮喘内型该研究强调了少数族裔青少年的 T2 低和 T17 高哮喘内型，为精准医疗和改善哮喘管理提供了见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Researchers-uncover-diverse-asthma-endotypes-in-youths-using-nasal-transcriptomics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Researchers-uncover-diverse-asthma-endotypes-in-youths-using-nasal-transcriptomics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75427551-618c-4783-bc82-e312ad182568 Tue, 07 Jan 2025 04:25:00 -0500 Researchers uncover diverse asthma endotypes in youths using nasal transcriptomics
更好的食物，更好的心情：饮食质量在心理健康中的作用澳大利亚研究人员发现，饮食质量（而不是饮食类型）对女性抑郁症状影响虽小但意义重大。含有新鲜和低加工食品的高质量饮食与较少的抑郁症状有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Better-food-better-mood-The-role-of-diet-quality-in-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Better-food-better-mood-The-role-of-diet-quality-in-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c577d729-90c0-4d47-a460-d0046480a638 Mon, 06 Jan 2025 23:39:00 -0500 Better food, better mood: The role of diet quality in mental health
罪魁祸首：成人重症肺炎病例中发现人类偏肺病毒在免疫功能正常的成人中由人类偏肺病毒引起的严重肺炎凸显了诊断挑战，并强调需要快速分子诊断来改善结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Hidden-culprit-Human-metapneumovirus-identified-in-severe-adult-pneumonia-case.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Hidden-culprit-Human-metapneumovirus-identified-in-severe-adult-pneumonia-case.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c6342a1a-317b-4f02-9069-9dd68ddf13af Mon, 06 Jan 2025 23:19:00 -0500 Hidden culprit: Human metapneumovirus identified in severe adult pneumonia case
新型 hMPV 毒株与幼儿呼吸道感染增加有关印度研究人员发现了新的 hMPV 谱系 A2.2.1 和 A2.2.2，强调了它们在儿科呼吸道感染中的作用以及潜在的公共卫生影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Novel-hMPV-strains-linked-to-rising-respiratory-infections-in-young-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Novel-hMPV-strains-linked-to-rising-respiratory-infections-in-young-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f1aa224c-f6a7-4653-ba1e-aa0bf3626758 Mon, 06 Jan 2025 22:44:00 -0500 Novel hMPV strains linked to rising respiratory infections in young children
